root.duplicate:title: Duplicate operator form
root.duplicate:message:
Detected another operator form already running.
Close all other operator forms and click the button below to reload the form in the current window.
root.controls:msg:sync:noConnection: Cannot unlock: no connection to the server :(
root.controls:msg:sync:remoteError: Cannot unlock: failed to get the key :(
root.controls:msg:popup: The popup window has been blocked :(
root.unlockDialog:message:unlock: To activate the {prodLine} production line, enter login and password of a user with the WMES Operator client activation privilege. Production line cannot be activated, if it is currently connected to the server from another computer.
root.unlockDialog:message:lock: To deactivate the {prodLine} production line, enter login and password of a user with the WMES Operator client activation privilege.
root.unlockDialog:error:ALREADY_UNLOCKED: Production line is currently running on a different computer!

root.endDowntimeDialog:title: Ending downtime confirmation
root.endDowntimeDialog:message: Are you sure you want to end the current downtime?
root.continueOrderDialog:title: Order continuation confirmation
root.continueOrderDialog:message: Are you sure you want to start the currently chosen order?
root.endWorkDialog:title: Ending work confirmation
root.endWorkDialog:warning: Ending work will finish {downtime, select, true{the current downtime and order} other{the current order}}. Make sure that the following fields have correct values, because after ending the work, you won't be able to change them.
root.endWorkDialog:quantityDone: Quantity done in the current order:
root.endWorkDialog:workerCount: Worker count in the current order:
root.unload:downtime:
Are you sure you want to close the browser leaving the production line in a state of downtime?

If you close the browser without Ending work, then the current downtime will be finished at the end of the current shift!
root.unload:order:
Are you sure you want to close the browser leaving the production line in a state of working?

If you close the browser without Ending work, then the current order will be finished at the end of the current shift!
root.isa:cancel:title: Request cancel confirmation
root.isa:cancel:message: Are you sure you want to cancel the chosen pallet {requestType} request?

root.taktTime:check:notFound: The specified serial number was not scanned yet.

root.settings:initialDowntimeWindow: Time to start the initial downtime on a shift [min]
root.settings:spigotPatterns: Select Spigot component matching one of the following patterns
root.settings:spigotNotPatterns: Ignore the selected component, if it also matches any of the following patterns
root.settings:spigotFinish: Force checking of the Spigot during order finish
root.settings:taktTime:lines: Limit scanning to the following lines:
root.settings:taktTime:last: Show Cycle Time of the last PCE
root.settings:taktTime:avg: Show average Cycle Time for the current order
root.settings:taktTime:sap: Show Takt Time for the current order
root.settings:taktTime:coeffs:help:
Each line should contain order's MRP for which the Takt Time coefficients should be adjusted, followed by names of the operation WorkCenters and values of the coefficients. For example: *: *=1.053 PIVATIC5=0.9
KE6: *=1 OUTDOOR5=1.1
